overview:
Churchill Nanje Mambe is an IT entrepreneur based in Cameroon. He is presently running AfroVision Group.

Churchill is a certified Macromedia Web developer. He founded AfroVision Group in 2006. AfroVision Groups offers web and software development services. He was listed among the 7 anglophone Cameroonians to watch.

Churchill has been in the IT industry since he was 19. He was working as an instructor in Trustech Institute of Technology in Buea Cameroon, after which he quit his job there to start his own business.

According to his recent interview with http://thecreativeafricans.com, Churchill stated that he started AfroVision Group wit the aim of inspiring and educating the youth in Cameroon about computers and the power of the Internet.

Churchill’s IT company has given back to his community by developing community tools like nexdimempire.com and ubstudents.com that helps the community in many ways.

milestones.source_description: CEO churchill mambe left his first job to start his company at 19 without a college degree

external_links.title: CEO churchill mambe left his first job to start his company at 19 without a college degree
